item.title: Sassa Old Age Disability and Srd R350 Grant Updates and Changes
item.description: Stay informed about the recent changes to the SASSA Grants during the 2023 budget speech. Learn about the extension of the SRD grant and increases to Old Age and Disability grants. Access to financial information and resources to check SRD status.

item.title: South African E-Wallets Help SRD Recipients Receive Funds
item.description: Discover the benefits of digital wallets and how to fast-track payments for COVID-19 SRD. E-wallets and Cash Send services can help you receive funds easily.
